titleStmt.title: William Nelson to James F. Robinson
CWG7684

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Head-Quarters Army of Kentucky,
Louisville, 28th Sept 1862
To His Excellency
the Governor of the
Commonwealth of Kentucky
Sir,

I have the honor to request the promotion of Sergeant George R McFadden of Company B. Second regiment of Kentucky volunteer infantry to the grade of Second Lieutenant in the same company and Regiment for uniform good conduct both in the presence of the enemy and in campaign

Very Respectfully
W. Nelson
Major Genl
Comg
